meanings.definition: People engaged in trade or commerce.
meanings.sent1: The tradespeople at the market were selling fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The tradespeople in the city center had shops filled with goods.
meanings.sent3: The tradespeople decided to have a competition to see who could sell the most items.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, tradespeople are the backbone of the economy.
meanings.sent5: The tradespeople worked hard to negotiate fair prices for their products.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals skilled in a particular trade or craft.
meanings.sent1: The tradespeople in the carpentry guild were known for their fine woodwork.
meanings.sent2: Local tradespeople gathered at the annual craft fair to showcase their talents.
meanings.sent3: The tradespeople in the bakery guild had a friendly competition to see who could bake the best cake.
meanings.sent4: The tradespeople in the blacksmith guild forged impressive weapons and tools.
meanings.sent5: The tradespeople honed their skills through years of practice and dedication.
